metadata.title: CVE-2018-8099 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Incorrect returning of an error code in the index.c:read_entry() functionleads to a double free in libgit2 before v0.26.2, which allows an attackerto cause a denial of service via a crafted repository index file.

criterions.comment: libgit2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
